div.div: Our Mission: In partnership with parents and our community, Sublette County School District #1 is committed to providing a student centered, 21st Century learning experience that will inspire all students to become lifelong learners and prepare each of them to be responsible and successful adults in a global society.

a.title: SCSD 1 Expands Free Meals Program to All Children 18 and Under - Delivery Service Begins April 14
a.aria-label: SCSD 1 Expands Free Meals Program to All Children 18 and Under - Delivery Service Begins April 14

div.span: SCSD 1 Expands Free Meals Program to All Children 18 and Under - Delivery Service Begins April 14

a.div:
Due to the sudden impact of the COVID -19 virus, SCSD 1 has received a waiver to expand our current meal offerings of breakfast and lunch to any child living in our school district, 18 years of age and under. (Debido al impacto repentino del virus COVID -19, SCSD 1 ha recibido una exención para ampliar nuestra oferta de comidas (desayuno y almuerz)o a todos los estudiantes de nuestro distrito escolar).
Click on this tile to apply.

If you need assistance completing the application, please contact Jeryl Fluckiger at 367-5560.

div.span: Next Community Coffee - Cancelled until further notice

div.div:
Join SCSD 1 School Board Chairman Jamison Ziegler and Superintendent Jay Harnack for coffee, hot chocolate and rolls. The Community Coffee is a great way to meet and get information from key administrators and Board of Education members on issues that impact SCSD 1. Attendees "set" the agenda with their questions. Community members may ask about and discuss any appropriate subject, as time allows.
Where: Administration Building/Room 146
665 N. Tyler
When: 9:30 a.m.

span.data-emptytext: Sublette County School District #1 provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Sublette County School District No. 1 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, disability, or religion in its programs or activities. Inquiries concerning Title VI, Title IX, Section 504, and ADA may be referred to Sublette County School District No. 1, Civil Rights Coordinator, 665 N Tyler, Pinedale, Wyoming 82941, 307-367-2139, or the Office for Civil Rights, Region VIII, U.S. Department of Education, Federal Building, Suite 310, 1244 Speer Blvd., Denver, Colorado 80204-03582, 303-844-5695 or TDD 303-844-3417, OCR.Denver@ed.gov.

p.span: Sublette County School District No. 1 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, disability, or religion in its programs or activities. Inquiries concerning Title VI, Title IX, Section 504, and ADA may be referred to Sublette County School District No. 1, Civil Rights Coordinator, 665 N Tyler, Pinedale, Wyoming 82941, 307-367-2139, or the Office for Civil Rights, Region VIII, U.S. Department of Education, Federal Building, Suite 310, 1244 Speer Blvd., Denver, Colorado 80204-03582, 303-844-5695 or TDD 303-844-3417, OCR.Denver@ed.gov.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.script: (function(d, s, id) {var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];window.key='WF2G3BLT';window.url='//www.k12insight.com/';if (d.getElementById(id))return;js = d.createElement(s);js.id = id;js.src = "//www.k12insight.com/Lets-Talk/LtTabJs.aspx";fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);}(document, 'script', 'Lets-Talk'));

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
